feedbacks.title: “An Event that Brings Developers Together”
feedbacks.name: Dawn Song
feedbacks.description:
“It’s a great event. I think we should organize more events like this where we bring the developers together and really talk about the technology.
It’s a way for the developer community to help everyone better understand cutting edge technology.”

feedbacks.title: “A Great Developer Conference”
feedbacks.name: Da Hongfei
feedbacks.description:
“It’s great. NEO is a technology platform, so we love to be
at developer conferences, and UDC
is a good one.”

feedbacks.title: “Upbit Developer Conference 2018  Comes to an End Successfull”
feedbacks.title_m: “Upbit Developer Conference 2018  Comes to an End Successfull”
feedbacks.name: etnews
feedbacks.description:
‘Upbit Developer Conference (UDC) 2018’, which had Chairman Sirgoo Lee of Dunamu, CEO Lee Sirgoo of Dunamu, and CEO Bill Shihara of Bittrex in attendance, came to an end on the 14th. UDC took place at ICC
(International Convention Center) JEJU
on the 13th and the 14th...
While blockchain events in the past were simply Meetup events where companies introduced their coins, UDC 2018 centered on developers that introduced technical skills and practicality.

feedbacks.title: “A Conference Actually Focused  on Blockchain Infrastructure”
feedbacks.title_m: “A Conference Actually Focused  on Blockchain Infrastructure”
feedbacks.name: Travis Moore
feedbacks.description:
“Unlike a lot of traditional
crypto conferences, UDC is actually focused on blockchain infrastructure which is something I think
we really need.”

feedbacks.title: “Great Chance to Meet  the Korean Blockchain Community”
feedbacks.title_m: “Great Chance to Meet  the Korean Blockchain Community”
feedbacks.name: Benjamin Bollen
feedbacks.description:
“It was the first time I’ve had
a chance to meet the Korean blockchain community and I loved it. Also, the organization was splendid and I was blown away.”

feedbacks.title:
“A Venue
for Stimulating Interactions”
feedbacks.name: Carl Youngblood
feedbacks.description: “It was amazing. The interactions I had with the attendees at UDC 2018 were really stimulating”

feedbacks.title:
“A Very Well-organized
Event”
feedbacks.name: Edward Greve
feedbacks.description:
“It was great. A lot of interesting people to talk with, and also UDC was very
organized and everything was done
really well”

feedbacks.title:
“High-quality Presenters
and Many Attendees”
feedbacks.name: Qi Zhou
feedbacks.description:
“It was very well-organized, and
the presenters were very high quality. There were a lot of attendees, so I was very happy to be there and present
our technology.”

feedbacks.title:
“Upbit Developer Conference Opens
in Jeju Island, Dunamu Chairman
Makes Welcome Remarks”
feedbacks.title_m:
“Upbit Developer Conference Opens
in Jeju Island, Dunamu Chairman
Makes Welcome Remarks”
feedbacks.name: Blockt
feedbacks.description:
South Korea’s Jeju Island was painted red by a global community of blockchain
enthusiasts on Thursday, Sept. 13, as the inaugural Upbit Developer Conference 2018 (UDC 2018) started off with a bang. Founder and Chairman of Dunamu Inc. Chi-Hyung Song took to the podium to...
welcome the attendees. The conference has lined up several major blockchain figures in the industry to address the gathering, including Onchain cofounder Jun Li and Bittrex CEO Bill Shihara, among others.

feedbacks.title:
“Opportunity to Present along
with Globally Renowned Blockchain
Experts”
feedbacks.title_m:
“Opportunity to Present
along with Globally Renowned
Blockchain Experts”
feedbacks.name: Yong-gil Kwon
feedbacks.description:
“It was an honor to present along
with so many globally renowned blockchain experts. It was truly
rewarding and meaningful
to be able to talk in depth about
the work we’re doing.”

feedbacks.title:
“Incredibly Professional
and Very Well-organized”
feedbacks.name: Gerard Moroney
feedbacks.description:
“I was very impressed. The UDC team
was incredibly professional. It was very well-presented and organized and I was very pleased with everything I saw.”

feedbacks.title: “Very Enjoyable”
feedbacks.name: Benedict Chan
feedbacks.description:
“It was very enjoyable. Everyone
was trying to see how they can apply
the blockchain and get adoption there.
It was a lot about building,
and I like that a lot.”

feedbacks.title:
“UDC 2018 is proof that blockchain
could be the next internet”
feedbacks.title_m:
“UDC 2018 is proof that blockchain
could be the next internet”
feedbacks.name: Joonang Daily
feedbacks.description:
“Over 700 people gathered in ICC Jeju’s Tamna Hall on the early morning of
the 13th for the two-day Upbit Developer Conference. Blockchain experts from around the world shared a common theme at the conference: the need for an everyday service based on blockchain ...

feedbacks.title:
“A Great Opportunity to Learn
about Dynamic and Fascinating
Blockchain Projects”
feedbacks.title_m:
“A Great Opportunity to Learn
about Dynamic and Fascinating
Blockchain Projects”
feedbacks.name: Heejo Lee
feedbacks.description:
“UDC was a great opportunity to learn firsthand about a wide variety
of dynamic and fascinating blockchain projects”

feedbacks.title:
“In-depth Presentations
and Audience Questions”
feedbacks.name: Brian Cheong
feedbacks.description:
“With most of the attendees being developers, both the presentations and audience questions were really in-depth. It was a very productive
conference.”

feedbacks.title:
“Meaningful Discussions on the
Present and Future of Blockchain
Technology”
feedbacks.title_m:
“Meaningful Discussions
on the Present and Future
of Blockchain Technology”
feedbacks.name: Jae-hyun Park
feedbacks.description:
“A lot of other conferences focus more
on the investment aspect, so to be able come together with other developers
to discuss the present and future
of blockchain technology was truly
meaningful.”

feedbacks.title:
“Dunamu Chairman: Developers
are the true foundation of
the blockchain ecosystem”
feedbacks.title_m:
“Dunamu Chairman: Developers
are the true foundation
of the blockchain ecosystem”
feedbacks.name: Jae-hyun Park
